directions: Mix corn, Cheddar-Monterey Jack cheese blend, sour cream, mayonnaise, cream cheese, green chiles, green onion, and jalapeno pepper together in a bowl.
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups shredded Cheddar-Monterey Jack cheese blend
2 jalapeno peppers, seeded and finely chopped
title: Jalapeno Corn Dip
